tool_description: Uncover cryptocurrency insights instantly. Get real-time market data, prices, and trends. Your key to confident crypto decisions.
name: CryptoAPI
title: CryptoAPI

api_list.name: Profit/Loss Calculator
api_list.description: Calculates and returns potential profit or loss based on provided information.

api_list.name: Social Sentiment Analysis for a Crypto
api_list.description: Calculates and returns social sentiment analysis for a specific crypto.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptoapi12.p.rapidapi.com/social-sentiment-analysis/monero"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptoapi12.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptoapi12.p.rapidapi.com/social-sentiment-analysis/{crypto_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptoapi12.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
